metaDescriptionProject.metaDescriptionProject: A series of videos by Lost Art to tease the release of new music from The Avalanches on XL Recordings.

metaKeywordsProject.metaKeywordsProject: Lost Art, Social Media, Campaign, XL Recording, Artwork, design, creative agency, branding, Chris Hopkins

content.content:
a series of four short mood videos were created to tease the release of new music from the avalanches upon social media channels. filmed in barcelona, each featured a different song from the forthcoming record.

social media, campaign


footage—cherise payne
art direction & edit—chris hopkins
commissioned by—universal & xl recordings
